scripts.start: concurrently -n BE,FD,LR,MO -c blue,magenta,yellow,green "npm run backend" "npm run python" "npm run plate-recognition" "npm run mobile:chrome"
scripts.start:macos: concurrently -n BE,FD,LR,MO -c blue,magenta,yellow,green "npm run backend" "npm run python" "npm run plate-recognition" "npm run mobile:macos"
scripts.start:windows: concurrently -n BE,FD,LR,MO -c blue,magenta,yellow,green "npm run backend" "npm run python" "npm run plate-recognition" "npm run mobile:windows"
scripts.start:ios: concurrently -n BE,FD,LR,MO -c blue,magenta,yellow,green "npm run backend" "npm run python" "npm run plate-recognition" "npm run mobile:ios"
scripts.start:android: concurrently -n BE,FD,LR,MO -c blue,magenta,yellow,green "npm run backend" "npm run python" "npm run plate-recognition" "npm run mobile:android"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n BE,FD,LR,MO -c blue,magenta,yellow,green "npm run backend" "npm run python" "npm run plate-recognition" "npm run mobile:all"
scripts.python: cd backend/python-service/face_recognition && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
scripts.plate-recognition: cd backend/python-service/plate_recognition && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../mobile && flutter pub get
